remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)This property is used by the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) `-security` (`-s`) 选项可关闭基于代码的安全性。`-security` (`-s`) option to turn off code-based security. 提供管理员禁用代码访问安全性的方法。 provides a way for administrators to disable code access security. 当禁用代码访问安全性时，所有代码访问要求都会成功。When code access security is disabled, all code access demands succeed. 实际上，这将授予的所有代码`FullTrust`。Effectively, this grants all code `FullTrust`. 禁用代码访问安全性可以绕过安全系统，以便代码可能会执行效果略好于等效的安全策略授予`FullTrust`于的所有代码。Disabling code access security bypasses the security system so that code might perform slightly better than the equivalent security policy granting `FullTrust` to all code. 此属性不会禁用基于角色的安全性;因此，需求不会受到影响。This property does not disable role-based security; therefore, demands are not affected. > [!CAUTION] > 禁用代码访问安全性会使系统容易受到恶意代码（如病毒和蠕虫）的攻击。Disabling code access security makes the system vulnerable to attacks by malicious code such as viruses and worms. 禁用代码访问安全性不会自动阻止从以任何方式运行的托管的代码。Disabling code access security does not automatically block managed code from running in any way. 它只会造成托管代码能够运行不受限制的代码访问安全系统，应仅为完成最格外谨慎。It only causes managed code to run without restriction by the code access security system, and should only be done with the most extreme caution. 已采取其他安全性措施以帮助保护系统的安全性时应仅完成关闭安全性以获得额外的性能。Turning off security to gain extra performance should only be done when other security measures have been taken to help protect system security. 其他的安全防范措施包括与公共网络断开连接、从物理上保证计算机的安全等等。Examples of other security precautions include disconnecting from public networks, physically securing computers, and so on. 对此属性的更改不会保留在注册表中，直到调用。A change to this property is not persisted in the registry until is called. 新进程将不会影响更改之前会将其保存在注册表中。New processes will not be affected by the change until it is persisted in the registry. 更改正在运行的进程中的该属性的值不一定更改状态按预期方式。Changing the value of this property in a running process does not necessarily change the state in the expected manner. 若要确保更改生效，必须调用并启动新进程。To ensure changes have taken effect, you must call and start a new process.
